name: JFrogDistribution
description: Create, update, sign, distribute or delete release bundles from JFrog Distribution
author: JFrog

inputs.name: distributionConnection
inputs.label: Distribution service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Distribution service to use in the command.

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The release bundle operation to perform.

inputs.name: rbName
inputs.label: Release bundle name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The release bundle's name.

inputs.name: rbVersion
inputs.label: Release bundle version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The release bundle's version.

inputs.name: specSource
inputs.label: File spec source
inputs.helpMarkDown: To specify the artifacts you wish to bundle and manipulate the target, please create a File Spec. To read more about the File Spec schema click here.

inputs.name: fileSpec
inputs.label: Spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use file spec from task configuration.

inputs.name: file
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use file spec from a local file.

inputs.name: replaceSpecVars
inputs.label: Replace spec variables
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select to replace variables in your File Spec.
In the File Spec, the variables should be used as follows: ${key1}.

inputs.name: specVars
inputs.label: Spec vars
inputs.helpMarkDown:
List of Spec vars.
List of variables in the form of "key1=value1;key2=value2;..." to be replaced in the File Spec.

inputs.name: autoSign
inputs.label: Automatically sign
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true, automatically signs the release bundle version.

inputs.name: passphrase
inputs.label: Passphrase
inputs.helpMarkDown: The passphrase for the signing key, if applicable.

inputs.name: useCustomRepo
inputs.label: Use custom repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to store release bundle artifacts in a custom repository at the source Artifactory.

inputs.name: customRepoName
inputs.label: Custom repo name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The repository name at the source Artifactory.

inputs.name: addReleaseNotes
inputs.label: Add release notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to release notes to the release bundle.

inputs.name: releaseNotesFile
inputs.label: Release notes file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a file that describes the release notes for the release bundle version.

inputs.name: releaseNotesSyntax
inputs.label: Release notes syntax
inputs.helpMarkDown: The syntax of the release notes.

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Description of the release bundle.

inputs.name: distRulesSource
inputs.label: Distribution rules file source
inputs.helpMarkDown: To specify the filters by which Artifactory Edge nodes are selected, please create a Distribution Rules File. To read more about the Distribution Rules File schema click here.

inputs.name: distRulesTaskFile
inputs.label: Distribution Rules File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use distribution rules file from task configuration.

inputs.name: distRulesFilePath
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use distribution rules file from a local file.

inputs.name: distSync
inputs.label: Sync
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to enable sync distribution (the command execution will end when the distribution process ends).

inputs.name: maxWaitSync
inputs.label: Sync timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Max minutes to wait for sync distribution.

inputs.name: deleteFromDist
inputs.label: Delete from Distribution
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to delete release bundle version in JFrog Distribution itself after deletion is complete in the specified Edge nodes.

inputs.name: dryRun
inputs.label: Dry run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to disable communication with JFrog Distribution.
